title: feat(swagger): Add Swagger annotations to Batch 1 - Core Authentication & User Management
body_x:
## Summary
Progressive implementation of Swagger/OpenAPI annotations for REST endpoints - Batch 1

This PR adds comprehensive Swagger annotations to **15 REST resource classes** focused on core authentication and user management APIs that most applications depend on.

## üîó Foundation Dependency
**‚ö†Ô∏è This PR depends on the infrastructure established in PR #32561**

- **Foundation PR**: [#32561 - Progressive Swagger annotations infrastructure](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/32561)
- **Requirement**: PR #32561 must be merged before this PR can be reviewed/merged
- **Why**: This PR uses the `@SwaggerCompliant` annotation and progressive testing framework created in #32561

## ‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT: Batch Rollout Process
**This PR is part of a progressive 8-batch rollout strategy established in PR #32561.**

- üîß **Foundation**: [PR #32561](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/32561) - Must be merged first
- ‚úÖ **Batch 1**: Ready for review after foundation is merged (this PR)
- ‚è≥ **Batch 2**: [PR #32657](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/32657) - Keep in draft until Batch 1 is merged
- ‚è≥ **Batch 3-8**: Keep in draft until previous batch is merged
- ‚è≥ **Batch 9**: [PR #32664](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/32664) - Keep in draft until Batch 8 is merged

**Do not remove draft state from subsequent batches until the previous batch has been successfully merged.**

## üéØ Automatic Testing Integration
This PR leverages the infrastructure from #32561 to enable **automatic testing**:

- ‚úÖ **Before this PR**: These 15 resources are not tested by compliance tests
- ‚úÖ **After this PR**: Resources are automatically discovered and tested via `@SwaggerCompliant` annotations
- ‚úÖ **Cumulative**: Future batches will test these resources plus their new ones

```bash
# Test only Batch 1 classes (using infrastructure from #32561)
./mvnw test -pl :dotcms-core -Dtest=RestEndpointAnnotationComplianceTest -Dtest.batch.max=1
```

## Batch 1: Core Authentication & User Management (15 classes)
**Theme**: Essential user and authentication APIs that most applications depend on

### Authentication Resources (7 classes)
- `AuthenticationResource` - Core authentication endpoints
- `ApiTokenResource` - API token management  
- `LoginFormResource` - Login form handling
- `LogoutResource` - User logout functionality
- `CreateJsonWebTokenResource` - JWT token creation
- `ForgotPasswordResource` - Password reset requests
- `ResetPasswordResource` - Password reset completion

### User Management Resources (3 classes)
- `UserResource` - User CRUD operations
- `PersonaResource` - User persona management
- `PersonalizationResource` - User personalization settings

### System Role Resources (2 classes)
- `RoleResource` - Role management
- `PermissionResource` - Permission handling

### Legacy User Resources (3 classes)
- `UserResource` (legacy) - Legacy user operations
- `RoleResource` (legacy) - Legacy role operations
- `DotSamlResource` - SAML authentication

## üß™ Testing Strategy
Uses the progressive testing framework established in #32561:

```bash
# Test only Batch 1 classes (after #32561 is merged)
./mvnw test -pl :dotcms-core -Dtest=RestEndpointAnnotationComplianceTest -Dtest.batch.max=1

# Test annotation validation
./mvnw test -pl :dotcms-core -Dtest=RestEndpointAnnotationValidationTest -Dtest.batch.max=1
```

## üìã Example Annotation Usage
This PR adds `@SwaggerCompliant` annotations (from #32561) to mark resources as properly documented:

```java
@SwaggerCompliant(value = "Core authentication and user management APIs", batch = 1)
@Tag(name = "Authentication")
@Path("/v1/authentication")
public class AuthenticationResource {
    // Properly annotated endpoints...
}
```

## üéØ Impact
- ‚úÖ Improves API documentation for core authentication flows
- ‚úÖ Enables automatic testing of these 15 resources (via #32561 infrastructure)
- ‚úÖ Enables better developer experience with OpenAPI spec generation
- ‚úÖ Maintains backward compatibility
- ‚úÖ Follows established annotation patterns and standards

## üìä Progress Tracking
This PR is **Batch 1 of 8** in the progressive rollout:
- **Total Resources**: 115 across 8 batches
- **This Batch**: 15 resources (13% of total)
- **Next**: Batch 2 (Content Management Core) - 14 resources

## üîó Related PRs
- **Foundation**: [#32561 - Progressive Swagger annotations infrastructure](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/32561) ‚Üê **Must merge first**
- **Next**: [#32657 - Batch 2 (Content Management Core)](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/32657)
- **Complete chain**: See PR #32561 for full rollout plan

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Merge Requirements
1. **Foundation PR #32561 must be merged first**
2. This PR can then be reviewed and merged
3. After this PR is merged, remove draft state from Batch 2 PR #32657
4. Continue sequential rollout through Batch 8

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
body_y:
Bug: Generic Type Mismatch in Error View Classes

 `ResponseEntityEventErrorView` and `ResponseEntityFilterErrorView` classes have a type parameter mismatch. Both extend `ResponseEntityView` but their constructors are initialized with `List`, which is incompatible with the declared generic type.

dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/rest/api/v1/event/ResponseEntityEventErrorView.java#L12-L17 https://github.com/dotCMS/core/blob/23507a1d9754fbb12c216240b6c5a220def570e8/dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/rest/api/v1/event/ResponseEntityEventErrorView.java#L12-L17
dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/rest/api/v1/pushpublish/ResponseEntityFilterErrorView.java#L12-L17 https://github.com/dotCMS/core/blob/23507a1d9754fbb12c216240b6c5a220def570e8/dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/rest/api/v1/pushpublish/ResponseEntityFilterErrorView.java#L12-L17
Fix in Cursor ‚Ä¢ Fix in Web
---

Bug: Incorrect Parameter Order in Constructors

 The constructors for `ResponseEntityTagOperationView` and `ResponseEntityTagInodeOperationView` pass parameters in the wrong order to their `ResponseEntityView` superclass. `errors` is passed as the first argument, but the entity (e.g., `additionalData` or `tagInodes`) should be the first argument, followed by `errors`.

dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/rest/ResponseEntityTagOperationView.java#L13-L18 https://github.com/dotCMS/core/blob/23507a1d9754fbb12c216240b6c5a220def570e8/dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/rest/ResponseEntityTagOperationView.java#L13-L18
dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/rest/ResponseEntityTagInodeOperationView.java#L13-L17 https://github.com/dotCMS/core/blob/23507a1d9754fbb12c216240b6c5a220def570e8/dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/rest/ResponseEntityTagInodeOperationView.java#L13-L17
Fix in Cursor ‚Ä¢ Fix in Web
---

Bug: Incorrect `operationId` Suffix in `UserResource`

 The `operationId` attribute within the `@Operation` annotation for the `update` method in `UserResource` is incorrectly set to "update_9". This suffix is an extraneous, likely auto-generated or debugging remnant, and should be corrected to "update" for proper OpenAPI specification.

dotCMS/src/test/java/com/dotcms/rest/RestEndpointAnnotationComplianceTest.java#L731-L732 https://github.com/dotCMS/core/blob/23507a1d9754fbb12c216240b6c5a220def570e8/dotCMS/src/test/java/com/dotcms/rest/RestEndpointAnnotationComplianceTest.java#L731-L732
dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/rest/api/v1/user/UserResource.java#L729-L730 https://github.com/dotCMS/core/blob/23507a1d9754fbb12c216240b6c5a220def570e8/dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/rest/api/v1/user/UserResource.java#L729-L730
Fix in Cursor ‚Ä¢ Fix in Web
--- _Was this report helpful? Give feedback by reacting with üëç or üëé_

body_y:
Bug: GET Methods Missing `@Consumes` Annotation

 The `@Consumes` annotation was removed from `VTLResource`'s GET methods (e.g., `get`, `dynamicGet`) that accept request body parameters. This prevents JAX-RS from properly deserializing the request body, leading to null or empty body data and breaking VTL template processing functionality.

dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/rest/api/v1/vtl/VTLResource.java#L74-L100 https://github.com/dotCMS/core/blob/e0d79b3714a9d5de4a1a5a6600b5970a942852e9/dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/rest/api/v1/vtl/VTLResource.java#L74-L100
dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/rest/api/v1/vtl/VTLResource.java#L348-L354 https://github.com/dotCMS/core/blob/e0d79b3714a9d5de4a1a5a6600b5970a942852e9/dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/rest/api/v1/vtl/VTLResource.java#L348-L354
---

Bug: Missing Annotation Causes VTL Processing Failure

 The `@Consumes({MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON, MediaType.TEXT_PLAIN})` annotation was removed from the `dynamicGet` methods. These methods still accept a `String bodyMapString` parameter, but without the `@Consumes` annotation, JAX-RS cannot properly deserialize request bodies (containing VTL templates) into this parameter, causing VTL template processing to fail.

dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/rest/api/v1/vtl/VTLResource.java#L326-L355 https://github.com/dotCMS/core/blob/e0d79b3714a9d5de4a1a5a6600b5970a942852e9/dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/rest/api/v1/vtl/VTLResource.java#L326-L355
---
